dc:description: Fragment of woven fabric with plied linen warp, remnants of linen weft wrapping and several colors of wool weft in bands as follows:

Remnants of linen patterning (weft wrapping) appear throughout the fragment.  The linen is very deteriorated but seems to be a roughly checkerboard pattern from the purple/red band to the 4.5 cm blue/green band.  In the 5.5 cm wide brown band, the linen weft wrapping forms a semi circle near the edge, with the remainder of linen patterning too deteriorated to describe.
